Name: Chicken Masala
Steps: dice chicken and mix chicken with garlic
after that mix that chicken with pepper and masala and leave that chicken
dice onion and garlic and after that bring pot and put oil in it
fry the onion and garlic till it turn yellow
put chicken and fry it for 3 min
after that put water in it and cook till the chicken meat is soft

Name: Chicken Salad
Steps: Dice the chicken and mix the chicken with salt
pepper and paprika
after that fry the chicken with less oil and leave it a side
cut apple
cut almond
cut carrot
cut cucumber and leave it in a bowl
take a bowl and put mayo yougurt salt pepper and mix
after that put chicken almond carrot cucumber and apple and the dressing that you just make
After that mix all together

Name: Thai Chicken Basil
Steps: Dice the chicken put it in a bowl
wash basil leaves and put it at a side
take a bowl and mix light soy sauce dark soy sauce sugar and oyster sauce
mince the garlic
take fry pan and put oil in it
After that put garlic in it and fry till it turn to yellow
after that put chicken in fry pan and fry together with garlic
after that put the sauce that mix together just now and fry till chicken turn to soft
Cut the chilli and Basil leaves
After that put those into fry pan and fry together with chicken. After 5 min then it is ready to enjoy

Name: Mohinga
Steps: toasted chickpea flour in a dry frying pan until it turn to golden
toast the rice flour in the same way
pound lemondgrass garlic chilli onion ginger and make it paste
Put paste that you make just now in fry pan and add tumeric and paprika and fry together
After that put mackerel fillets and stir together
Add toasted chickpea flour and toasted rice flour until the paste is thicker
After that pour water and add fish sauce. Boil for 15 minuteswith medium heat
Add Shallots and pinch of pepper into soup
After that add rice vermicelli noodle and boil it for 7 minutes
After that put it in put and add boiled egg and chopped coriander
You can enjoy now

Name: Fish and Chip
Steps: Soak the chopped potatoes in cold water for 5 minutes
After that rinse the water and mix with salt and vinegar then fry in fry pan with oil
After that put it at a side
To amke tartare sauce put mayonnaise shallots and parsely together and mix
To prepare batter take a bowl and put a pinch of salt flour tumeric and fizzy water
Mix everything together and beat the batter to get creamy
Put fillet fish in batter and fry in fry pan with sunflower oil
Fry till it turn into golden brown
After that put fried potatoes
tartare sauce  and fried fish in a plate and you can enjoy
